definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

pinyin: da4 liang4 sha1 shang1 wu3 qi4

sentences.english: Post-impressionism reflected a number of the same attitudes as symbolism in literature.
sentences.chinese: 後印象派反映了大量與文學象徵主義相似的態度。

sentences.english: In the article 50 Totally Free Lessons in Graphic Design Theory the TutsPlus family definitely delivers with a bevy of knowledge building lessons in theory
sentences.chinese: 50節圖形設計免費課程將教授你大量的理論知識。

sentences.english: The bank granted a large loan to the company.
sentences.chinese: 銀行貸給這家公司大量款項。

sentences.english: He got a whole sackful of letters from listeners following the show.
sentences.chinese: 演出後他收到大量的聽衆來信。

sentences.english: We need to unleash massive private investment in clean energy.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須在清潔能源方面發動大量的私人投資。

sentences.english: A large sum of money was spent in building the tower.
sentences.chinese: 建造那座塔花費大量錢財。

sentences.english: Within three years he accumulated great wealth by speculations in stocks.
sentences.chinese: 三年內他靠炒買股票積聚了大量財富。

sentences.english: Shop windows were shattered. Cars were smashed.
sentences.chinese: 商店玻璃破碎，汽車被砸毀，大量傷者躺在街頭。

sentences.english: There are only four regions in the world where huge reserves of diamond are found.
sentences.chinese: 世界上只有四個地區被人發現有大量金剛石。

sentences.english: Desalting of crude oil consumes huge quantity of fresh water.
sentences.chinese: 原油脫鹽要消耗大量的新鮮水。

sentences.english: Of course, lots of cookies means some of them must be put away for later days.
sentences.chinese: 當然，大量的曲奇就意味着有一些會被留着以後再喫。

sentences.english: With more forests being destoryed, huge quantities of good earth are washed away each year.
sentences.chinese: 由於更多森林被破壞，每年有大量的好土壤流失掉了。

sentences.english: Thev artist does all the active work, makes the biggest emotional investment.
sentences.chinese: 藝術家獨攬了所有的創造性工作，投入了大量的心血。

sentences.english: Typically, this is used in environments that do not require substantial network bandwidth.
sentences.chinese: 通常，這種特性用於不需要大量網絡帶寬的環境。

sentences.english: Cranberry bogs consume lots of space in the marshland.
sentences.chinese: 蔓越莓沼澤溼地佔據了大量的空間。

sentences.english: Spotify offers a number of subscriptions.

definition: (used for abstract things) a good deal, a lot of
some/a few/a little/(following an adjective) slightly ...er
in large part/the greater part/the majority
due to/as a result of/thanks to/owing to/since/because
